insert into commentinfo (userId, contentId, url, score, creatStamp, `status`, content) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update commentinfo set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contentId = #{contentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creatStamp = #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where commentId = #{commentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select commentId, userId, contentId, url, score, creatStamp, `status`, content from commentinfo
